data.title: EBSCO Information Services
data.meta_description: EBSCO is the leading provider of research databases, e-journals, magazine subscriptions, ebooks and discovery service for academic libraries, public libraries, corporations, schools, government and medical institutions
data.text:

A Perfect PICO Search

PICO is a format for developing a good clinical research question prior to starting oneâ€™s research. This free white paper covers seven steps to a perfect PICO search.
